instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924A Backlight Issue
threads.message:
There was a corrosion on LCD pins

there is an Image on LCD but no Backlight

Can you help me troubleshoot this mother board?

threads.title: 820-4924A Backlight Issue
threads.message:
Did you change LCD connector?
BKLT_EN_R is present?
Any voltage on D7710 pins?
Check F7700.

threads.title: 820-4924A Backlight Issue
threads.message:
Did you change LCD connector? Yes 

BKLT_EN_R : Not Present
D7710  :No Voltage

F7700 : 12.6 .. Working FIne

threads.title: 820-4924A Backlight Issue
threads.message:
Check EDP_BKLT_EN and EDP_BKLT_PSR_EN.
Remember to keep internal LCD connected, when diagnose backlight issue.

Just in case, do PRAM reset 2-3 times.
